description:
In the year 2010, I started looking for ways to legitimately make money online working from home. I had just graduated from college with a diploma in Broadcast Journalism. I loved editing and creating videos thus I was interested in doing video editing jobs.

In my first days, I became a victim to a couple of scam sites who claimed to pay me thousands of dollars on data entry jobs. This alone costed me over $1000 and 3 months of my time.

Then I was introduced to Odesk online freelancer site. I signed up but I did not concentrate my efforts in there as I was worried it might be another scam. I started earning from odesk 6 months after I signed up. I got convinced by what other freelancers shared on odesk blog thus I applied and got my first job which earned me $15. Since then, I have not looked back.

Over time, I have discovered other freelancing sites namely Elance, Freelancer, Peopleperhour and Guru.

My first earning was $15. I was excited. within 3 months, my income grew to $100 a month. To date my income has significantly grew to $3000 on a good month. I have also Learn't how to hire other contractors online to work for me when my workload is huge.

I have created this course to share with you my experience working from home as a freelance video producer.

In this 5 video session course ‘Making Money Online Course for Starters’'' I show you exactly how I make money on-line as a freelance video producer.

In session one of the course, I am going to introduce you to different genres of video production techniques. We are also going to explore the types of videos that you can edit, create or produce and get paid on-line while working from the comfort of your house.

In session two of the course we are going to discuss what you need in order to create and deliver top-notch quality videos and win more high paying clients. Also we will point out where to buy a course and learn video production from scratch for newbies.

In session three of the course we are going to discuss how to find jobs on-line and begin working from home. Here we will explore different freelancing sites that offers video production jobs with guaranteed payments.

In session four of the course we are going to discuss six things you should consider when creating your portfolio and market your work. We will look into additional things you need to have to stand out from the crowd.

In session five of the course we are going to look into how to manage your time and expenses once you start getting jobs streaming in.

Take this golden opportunity to learn how you can also make money online working from home as a video producer.

See you in class!
title: Ways to Start a Legitimate Business Working from Home
